Title: The Missing Star
Writer: Ermanno Rea (novel), Gianni Amelio (screenplay), Umberto Contarello (screenplay)
Actors: Sergio Castellitto, Ling Tai, Angelo Costabile, Hiu Sun Ha
Plot: Labourer Vincenzo travels from Italy to China in search of a machine with a deficiency that was produced in the now defunct establishment at which Vincenzo worked for years.
